info.title: Spoonacular Recipe
info.description: The spoonacular Nutrition, Recipe, and Food allows you to access over 380,000 recipes, thousands of ingredients, food products, and menu items. Spoonacular Recipe makes it possible to search for recipes using natural language queries, such as "gluten free brownies without sugar" or "low fat vegan cupcakes." You can automatically calculate the nutritional information for any recipe, visualize ingredient lists and much more.

get.description: Use a recipe id to get full information about a recipe, such as ingredients, nutrition, diet and allergen information, etc.

parameters.name: includeNutrition
parameters.description: The included nutrition in the recipe.

get.description: Find recipes which are similar to the given one.
Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty.
Get a recipe's equipment list.
Visualize a recipe's equipment list as an image.
Get a recipe's price breakdown data.
Visualize a recipe's price breakdown.
Get a recipe's ingredient list.
Visualize a recipe's ingredient list.
Get a recipe's nutrition data.
Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as an image.
Get a recipe's nutrition label as an HTML widget.
Get a recipe's nutrition label as an image.
Get an analyzed breakdown of a recipe's instructions. Each step is enriched with the ingredients and equipment required.
Visualize a recipe's ingredient list.
Get a recipe's taste. The tastes supported are sweet, salty, sour, bitter, savory, and fatty.
Visualize a recipe's equipment list.
Visualize a recipe's price breakdown.
Automatically generate a short description that summarizes key information about the recipe.
Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as HTML including CSS.
Get information about multiple recipes at once. This is equivalent to calling the Get Recipe Information endpoint multiple times, but faster.

parameters.name: includeNutrition
parameters.description: The included nutrition in the recipe.

get.description: Find random (popular) recipes. If you need to filter recipes by diet, nutrition etc. you might want to consider using the complex recipe search endpoint and set the sort request parameter to random.
Autocomplete a partial input to suggest possible recipe names.
This endpoint lets you extract recipe data such as title, ingredients, and instructions from any properly formatted Website.

post.description: Visualize a recipe's taste information as HTML including CSS. You can play around with that endpoint!
Visualize a recipe's nutritional information as HTML including CSS.
Visualize the price breakdown of a recipe.

This endpoint allows you to break down instructions into atomic steps. Furthermore, each step will contain the ingredients and equipment required. Additionally, all ingredients and equipment from the recipe's instructions will be extracted independently of the step they're used in.

get.description: Parse a recipe search query to find out its intention.

parameters.name: q
parameters.default: salmon with fusilli and no nuts

get.description: Convert amounts like "2 cups of flour to grams".

post.description: Visualize ingredients of a recipe. You can play around with that endpoint!

get.description: Estimate the macronutrients of a dish based on its title.
Answer a nutrition related natural language question.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Your question about nutrition and food.
parameters.default: How much vitamin c is in 2 apples?
